mapper.select: SELECT ps.pending_sale_id pendingSaleId, vs.verified_sale_id verifiedSaleId, up.used_product_id usedProductId, ps.category_name userCategory, ps.brand_name userBrand, ps.inspection_status saleStatus, ps.excepted_selling_price userPrice, ps.product_size userSize, ps.used_or_not userUsedOrNot, vs.product_name productName, vs.product_size verifiedSize, vs.verified_selling_price verifiedPrice, vs.used_or_not verifiedUsedOrNot, up.used_product_type usedProductType, sg.grade_type gradeType FROM member m INNER JOIN pending_sale ps ON ps.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN verified_sale vs ON ps.pending_sale_id = vs.pending_sale_id LEFT OUTER JOIN used_product up ON vs.verified_sale_id = up.used_product_id INNER JOIN sale_grade sg ON sg.sale_grade_id = vs.sale_grade_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND ps.inspection_status = 'ACCEPTED' AND vs.rejected_sale_id is null ORDER BY ps.created_date DESC LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}

SELECT ps.pending_sale_id pendingSaleId, ps.category_name userCategory, ps.brand_name userBrand, ps.product_name productName, ps.inspection_status saleStatus, ps.excepted_selling_price userPrice, ps.product_size userSize, ps.used_or_not userUsedOrNot FROM member m INNER JOIN pending_sale ps ON ps.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND ps.inspection_status = 'WAITING' ORDER BY ps.created_date DESC LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}

SELECT ps.pending_sale_id pendingSaleId, vs.verified_sale_id verifiedSaleId, ps.category_name userCategory, ps.brand_name userBrand, ps.product_name productName, ps.inspection_status saleStatus, ps.excepted_selling_price userPrice, ps.product_size userSize, ps.used_or_not userUsedOrNot, sg.grade_type gradeType FROM member m INNER JOIN pending_sale ps ON ps.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN verified_sale vs ON ps.pending_sale_id = vs.pending_sale_id INNER JOIN sale_grade sg ON sg.sale_grade_id = vs.sale_grade_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND ps.inspection_status = 'SELLING' ORDER BY ps.created_date DESC LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}

SELECT ps.pending_sale_id pendingSaleId, vs.verified_sale_id verifiedSaleId, ps.category_name userCategory, ps.brand_name userBrand, ps.product_name productName, ps.inspection_status saleStatus, ps.excepted_selling_price userPrice, ps.product_size userSize, ps.used_or_not userUsedOrNot, sg.grade_type gradeType FROM member m INNER JOIN pending_sale ps ON ps.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN verified_sale vs ON ps.pending_sale_id = vs.pending_sale_id LEFT OUTER JOIN used_product up ON vs.verified_sale_id = up.used_product_id INNER JOIN sale_grade sg ON sg.sale_grade_id = vs.sale_grade_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND ps.inspection_status = 'SOLD' ORDER BY ps.created_date DESC LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}

SELECT ps.pending_sale_id pendingSaleId, vs.verified_sale_id verifiedSaleId, up.used_product_id usedProductId, ps.category_name userCategory, ps.brand_name userBrand, ps.inspection_status saleStatus, ps.excepted_selling_price userPrice, ps.product_size userSize, ps.used_or_not userUsedOrNot, vs.product_size verifiedSize, vs.verified_selling_price verifiedPrice, vs.used_or_not verifiedUsedOrNot, up.used_product_type usedProductType, rr.reason reason FROM member m INNER JOIN pending_sale ps ON ps.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN verified_sale vs ON ps.pending_sale_id = vs.pending_sale_id INNER JOIN used_product up ON vs.verified_sale_id = up.used_product_id INNER JOIN rejection_reason rr ON rr.rejection_reason_id = vs.rejected_sale_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND ps.inspection_status = 'REJECTED' AND vs.sale_grade_id is null ORDER BY ps.created_date DESC LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}
